```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(fivethirtyeight)
```


```{r}
congress_age %>%
  filter(party %in% c("D", "R")) %>%
  mutate(year = format(termstart, "%Y")) %>%
  group_by(year, party) %>%
  summarize(meanAge = mean(age)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = meanAge, group = party, color = party)) + 
    geom_line() + 
    scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(1950, 2010, by = 10)) +
    labs(title = "Average Age of Members in Congress", subtitle = "At start of term, 1947-2013")
```
